import React from 'react'; const Home1 = ({data}) => { const background=`${data?.weather[0]?.main}.jpg`; const icon=`${data?.weather[0]?.main}.png` var today = new Date(); const day=['Sun','Mon','Tue','Wed','Thu','Fri','Sat'] console.log(data) return (
{Math.round(data?.main.temp-273.15)}℃

{data?.name}

{day[today.getDay()]},{data?.weather[0].description}

Wind {data?.main.humidity}
Humidity {data?.main.pressure}
Speed {data?.weather.speed}
); }; export default Home1;
